resources.string: An application for managing a frontal exam in a safe and easy way!
Please fill in all required fields
Please enter a valid email address
Welcome! The details have been successfully saved
Remember! Any attempt to change permissions will be immediately reported to the supervisor automatically
Warning: Once you enter the exam, you are not allowed to exit the application or change permissions!
This class is not scheduled for the current time.
Do Not Disturb permission required\nSettings -> Notifications -> Do Not Disturb -> Turn on
Are you sure you want to logout? All your information will be lost!

Are you sure you want to disconnect?\nPlease note, this action is only permitted if you have completed the exam and submitted it to the instructor.\nClicking this button during the exam will automatically send an update to the instructor and may jeopardize your exam!
in the process of exiting the exam, pay attention!
turns off Do Not Disturb permission!

The application was created as a final project by Meir Shuvax and Mordechai Atiya, students at Hadassah Academic College Jerusalem, under the guidance of lecturer Muawyah Akash, and led by projects coordinator Tuvia Rosenberg.
For improvements and suggestions, write to us at:

ExaMate is an Android app designed to simplify the exam process and save on costs and paper resources. The app allows teachers to create virtual classrooms and upload permitted exam materials while locking students\' devices during the exam to ensure exam integrity.

1. Register as a teacher: Fill in personal details, and select the teacher status.
2. Create a class: The teacher will create a new class, define exam details, and upload relevant materials. The exam date and start time will be set to the same time to allow immediate exam start.
3. Start exam: From the list of classes created by the teacher, the teacher will select the new class they just created and choose "Start Exam".
4. Show QR code for connection: The teacher will display the connection QR code to the students.
5. View connected list: The teacher will verify that the students have joined the class.
6. Show QR code for disconnection: The teacher will display the disconnection QR code to the students at the end of the exam.
7. Update connected list: The teacher will verify that the disconnected students are no longer on the list.
8. Delete or update class: The teacher can update class details or delete it from the list.

1. Register as a student: Fill in personal details, and select the student status.
2. Upload files from the device: The student will upload PDF files from the device to the app. These files will be displayed during the exam only if the teacher has approved them in the class settings.
3. Connect to an existing class: The student will scan the QR code provided by the teacher using the camera and join the class. All class details should appear.
4. Lock the device: Upon connection, the student will see that the app has taken control of the system with no way to exit during the exam, and the teacher will see alerts for any break-in attempts.
5. View files: The student side will attempt to access the files uploaded by the teacher and search for values.
6. Disconnect: At the end of the exam, the student will scan a new code from the teacher's app and regain access to the device.
